name: get_system_capacity_metrics
description: Retrieves current capacity utilization metrics for systems including CPU, memory, disk, and network usage

system_ids.description: List of system IDs to query. If empty, returns metrics for all monitored systems

metric_types.description: Types of capacity metrics to retrieve

time_range_hours.description: Number of hours of historical data to include for trend analysis

name: get_capacity_thresholds
description: Retrieves configured capacity threshold limits and alerting rules for systems and resources

system_ids.description: List of system IDs to get thresholds for. If empty, returns thresholds for all systems

threshold_types.description: Types of threshold levels to retrieve

name: forecast_capacity_trends
description: Generates capacity forecasts based on historical usage patterns and growth trends

system_ids.description: List of system IDs to forecast. If empty, forecasts for all monitored systems

forecast_days.description: Number of days into the future to forecast

historical_days.description: Number of days of historical data to use for trend analysis

name: identify_threshold_violations
description: Identifies systems that are currently exceeding thresholds or projected to exceed them within a specified timeframe

forecast_days.description: Number of days ahead to check for projected threshold violations

severity_levels.description: Severity levels of thresholds to check against

resource_types.description: Types of resources to check for threshold violations

include_current_violations.description: Whether to include systems currently violating thresholds
